snippet: The upper chamber of the Legislature, known for dysfunction and scandal, introduced a site that facilitates senator-constituent communication.
abstract: New York State Senate unveils updated website nysenate.gov, which cost $525,000 and took two years to get up and running; site will allow voters to track legislation and votes cast by their senators and provides them with means to offer their commentary on bills.
lead_paragraph: The upper chamber of the Legislature, known for dysfunction and scandal, introduced a site that facilitates senator-constituent communication.

headline.main: A New Website for the New York Senate? Aye
headline.print_headline: A ‘Groundbreaking Tool for Democracy’? It’s a Redesigned Website for the State Senate
